DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare between single balloon catheter and double balloon catheter for ripening the cervix among pregnant with unfavorable cervix.
DOC.brief_title: Single Balloon Catheter Compared With Double Balloon Catheter for Ripening of the Unfavorable Cervix
DOC.criteria: Induction of labor is indicated Gestational age between 24 42 weeks Singleton pregnancy Bishop score less than 7 Any contraindication for vaginal delivery Previous cesarean delivery Low lying placenta Rupture of membranes Fetal malformations incompatible with life intrauterine fetal death Amnionitis Genital viral infection (HIV, hepatitis C virus , hepatitis B virus) Allergy to latex
